reviews.content:
The integration of this tweak is awesome, using it since iOS 12!

But since recently only the blurred background shows album arts, the actual foreground is gone somehow. There’s already a post on Reddit about it. Hope it gets fixed soon!

Makes music app extremely laggy on iPhone 6s+
Starting playback takes >30s, switching songs manually up to 20s. 
No other tweaks for music are installed. Uninstalling Flow resolves the problem. 
Hopefully this can be fixed
Works with Spotify and Apple Music, which are my two main music players. iOS 12.4 A12
Hope you don’t want to use a white Lock Screen
great tweak but currently not working on 14.3 unc0ver so wait until there’s an update
Working on 14.3 in iphone 12 pro max
Doesn’t seem to work for me, emailed dev

it is blank like no album art shows. this means i also can’t switch songs by swiping. occasionally it does show but it would be the wrong album art or it shows something like a youtube thumbnail from a video i watched hours ago
